title: As New York Fashion Week Goes Consumer, Will It Stay Useful To The Fashion Industry?
content:
18:22 GMT 
 
How would you like a backstage look at New York Fashion Week? What about a front-row seat, with the same view as the glittering line of celebrities and industry icons? WME/IMG, an entertainment and sports management agency that owns and operates 13 major fashion weeks worldwide, just finished beta testing giving that level of access to consumers outside the industry. But it comes  …
